idea-plugin.name: Nimatron
idea-plugin.description:
Language plugin for the Nim programming language.

Currently provides the following features:

  • Syntax-highlighting.
  • Nim routines (funcs, procs, etc) listed in Structure View.
  • Folding of Nim statements.

The parser used to provide Structure View and code folding is currently a work in progress. Syntax highlighting is done by a dedicated lexer. Errors may be shown for Nim source that is not fully recognised yet by the parser but may still be valid. Please do use the issue tracker to provide examples where valid Nim code is showing errors in the editor.

This is my first plugin for IDEA-platform IDEs. I am also new to Nim. I like Nim and working with parsers. Though, this project seems quite challenging I will keep working on it as I will also use it. Nim seems like a very nice language to work with, though I think perhaps it's not easy to define a parser for it here. Indents are particularly difficult. Anyway, thank-you for your patience. I hope you find the plugin useful.
